name: exec_in_pod
description: Execute a command in a Kubernetes pod or container and return the output

name.description: Name of the pod to execute the command in

namespace.description: Kubernetes namespace where the pod is located

command.description: Command to execute in the pod (string or array of args)

container.description: Container name (required when pod has multiple containers)

shell.description: Shell to use for command execution (e.g. '/bin/sh', '/bin/bash'). If not provided, will use command as-is.

timeout.description: Timeout for command - 60000 milliseconds if not specified
